module.name: Grids
module.short: Classes for displaying tabular data as a series of rows and columns

element.name: GRIDFILEVERSION
element.short: Current revision level for the grids.pas file

dl.dd: Initial revision
Introduced goSmoothScroll grid option
Introduced Col/Row FixedAttr and NormalAttr

element.name: GM_SETVALUE
element.short: Lazarus message for setting the value in a grid edit control

element.name: GM_GETVALUE
element.short: Lazarus message for getting the value in a grid edit control

element.name: GM_SETGRID
element.short: Lazarus message for setting the grid for an edit control

element.name: GM_SETBOUNDS
element.short: Lazarus message for setting the bounds for a grid edit control

element.name: GM_SELECTALL
element.short: Lazarus message for selecting the content in a grid edit control

element.name: GM_SETMASK
element.short: Lazarus message for setting the edit mask used in a grid edit control

element.name: GM_SETPOS
element.short: Lazarus message for setting the position of a grid edit control

element.name: GM_READY
element.short: Lazarus message sent when the grid can display its editing controls

element.name: GM_GETGRID
element.short: Lazarus message used to get the grid for an editing control

element.name: EO_AUTOSIZE
element.short: Represents the auto-size editor option in a grid message

element.name: EO_HOOKKEYDOWN
element.short: Represnts the hook key down editor option in a grid message

element.name: EO_HOOKKEYPRESS
element.short: Represents the hook key press editor option in a grid message

element.name: EO_HOOKKEYUP
element.short: Represents the hook key up editor option in a grid message

element.name: EO_SELECTALL
element.short: Represents the select all content editor option in a grid message

element.name: EO_IMPLEMENTED
element.short: Represents the implemented editor option in a grid message

element.name: DEFCOLWIDTH
element.short: Default width for columns in a grid control

descr.p: DEFCOLWIDTH is a constant used as the default width for columns in a grid control. The value for the constant is 64 (pixels). DEFCOLWIDTH is used when getting the value for the DefColWidth in TCustomGrid.

element.name: DEFBUTTONWIDTH
element.short: Default width for edit control buttons in a grid

descr.p: DEFBUTTONWIDTH is a constant that contains the default width for the button displayed in a grid cell editor. The value for the constant is 25 (pixels). DEFBUTTONWIDTH is used when setting the bounds for TButtonCellEditor controls.

element.name: DEFIMAGEPADDING
element.short: Default padding used for title images displayed in a grid

descr.p: DEFIMAGEPADDING is a constant which contains the padding added to images displayed in the fixed title area for grid controls. The value for the constant is 2 (pixels). DEFIMAGEPADDING is used in methods like TCustomGrid.DrawColumnTitleImage and TCustomStringGrid.AutoAdjustColumn.

element.name: EGridException
element.short: Exception raised for an error occurring in a Grid class

descr.p: Used mainly when a row or a column position is invalid for a grid control.

element.name: TGridOption
element.short: Represents grip option values available for grid controls

descr.p: TGridOption is an enumerated type with values that represent grid options available in LCL grid controls. Values from TGridOption are stored in a TGridOptions set type to indicate that the grid feature or behavior is enabled.
Values from TGridOption are stored in the DefaultGridOptions constant which defines the default set of options for LCL grid controls.

element.name: TGridOption.goFixedVertLine
element.short: Shows vertical lines around fixed cells

element.name: TGridOption.goFixedHorzLine
element.short: Shows horizontal lines around fixed cells

element.name: TGridOption.goVertLine
element.short: Show vertical lines

element.name: TGridOption.goHorzLine
element.short: Show horizontal lines

element.name: TGridOption.goRangeSelect
element.short: Enables range selection for grid cells

element.name: TGridOption.goDrawFocusSelected
element.short: Enables focused drawing for selected cell(s)

element.name: TGridOption.goRowSizing
element.short: Allow user to change row height

element.name: TGridOption.goColSizing
element.short: Allow user to change column width

element.name: TGridOption.goRowMoving
element.short: Enables moving the position of an entire row in a grid

element.name: TGridOption.goColMoving
element.short: Enables moving the position of an entire column in a grid

element.name: TGridOption.goEditing
element.short: Allows editing in grid cells

element.name: TGridOption.goAutoAddRows
element.short: Automatically add new rows
element.descr: Does not add rows if the last cell is empty and goAutoAddRowsSkipContentCheck is not set.

element.name: TGridOption.goTabs
element.short: Controls Tab key behavior in the grid

descr.p: When included in the TCustomGrid.Options property, the Tab key changes the active cell within the grid. When omitted from the grid Options, the Tab key changes to the next active control.

element.name: TGridOption.goRowSelect
element.short: Select the whole row instead of only one cell

element.name: TGridOption.goAlwaysShowEditor
element.short: Always shows the cell editor

descr.p: Always shows the cell editor. If not set, the user has to enter edit mode by data characters for the cell, or by pressing the F2 key.

element.name: TGridOption.goThumbTracking
element.short: Enables tracking of the thumb position in grid scroll bars

element.name: TGridOption.goColSpanning
element.short: Enable cellextent calculations

element.name: TGridOption.goRelaxedRowSelect
element.short: User can see focused cell on goRowSelect

element.name: TGridOption.goDblClickAutoSize
element.short: Double clicking column's borders (on headers) resize column

element.name: TGridOption.goSmoothScroll
element.short: Switch scrolling mode
element.descr: Default is pixel scroll.

element.name: TGridOption.goFixedRowNumbering
element.short: Show row numbers in first fixed column

descr.p: The displayed row numbers starts with 1. The row number is displayed when no text has been directly assigned to the fixed cell.

element.name: TGridOption.goScrollKeepVisible
element.short: Keeps focused cell visible while scrolling

element.name: TGridOption.goHeaderHotTracking
element.short: Header cells change look when mouse is over them

element.name: TGridOption.goHeaderPushedLook
element.short: Header cells looks pushed when clicked

element.name: TGridOption.goSelectionActive
element.short: Setting grid selection also moves the cell cursor

element.name: TGridOption.goFixedColSizing
element.short: Allow to resize fixed columns

element.name: TGridOption.goDontScrollPartCell
element.short: Selecting a partially visible cell will not scroll the grid content

element.name: TGridOption.goCellHints
element.short: Show individual cell hints
element.descr: Requires the ShowHint to be set to TRUE. If set, the Hint will be ignored. Instead the OnGetCellHint event will be called for each cell.

element.name: TGridOption.goTruncCellHints
element.short: Truncates cell hints when they are longer than the cell content

element.name: TGridOption.goCellEllipsis
element.short: Shows an Ellipsis (...) at the end of truncated cell hints

element.name: TGridOption.goAutoAddRowsSkipContentCheck
element.short: Also add a row if last row is empty
element.descr: goAutoAddRows must also be set. Otherwise this option does not take effect at all.

element.name: TGridOption.goRowHighlight
element.short: Highlights the current Row in a grid control

element.name: TGridOptions
element.short: Set type used to store enabled grid options

descr.p: TGridOptions is a set type used to store values from the TGridOption enumeration. The features or behaviors in TGridOption are enabled when their enumeration values are included in the set. TGridOptions is the type used for the TCustomGrid.Options property.

element.name: TGridOption2.goScrollToLastCol
element.short: Allows scrolling to last column (so that last column can be leftcol)

element.name: TGridOption2.goScrollToLastRow
element.short: Allows scrolling to last row (so that last row can be toprow)

element.name: TGridOptions2
element.short: Set type used to store enabled grid options from TGridOption2

element.name: TGridSaveOptions
element.short: Represents save options available for LCL grid controls

element.name: TGridSaveOptions.soDesign
element.short: Enables saving grid structure (col/row count and Options)

element.name: TGridSaveOptions.soAttributes
element.short: Enables saving grid attributes (Font, Brush, TextStyle)

element.name: TGridSaveOptions.soContent
element.short: Enables saving Grid content (Text in TStringGrid)

element.name: TGridSaveOptions.soPosition
element.short: Enables saving the Grid cursor and selection position

element.name: TSaveOptions
element.short: Set type used to store TGridSaveOptions values

element.name: TGridDrawState
element.short: Enumeration with Grid draw state values

descr.p: TGridDrawState is an enumeration with values that represent grid drawing states for a grid control. Values in TGridDrawState indicate the display attributes applied to a row, column, or individual cell in a grid control.
TGridDrawState arguments are passed to event handlers and methods in TCustomGrid.

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdSelected
element.short: Drawn in its Selected state

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdFocused
element.short: Drawn in its Focused state

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdFixed
element.short: Drawn using the Fixed cell colors

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdHot
element.short: Drawn using the Hot display attributes

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdPushed
element.short: Drawn in a Pushed state

element.name: TGridDrawState.gdRowHighlight
element.short: Drawn using the row highlighting color

element.name: TGridState
element.short: Enumerated type with grid state values

descr.p: TGridState is an enumerated type with values that reflect the state in a grid control. TGridState values represent actions performed using a grid control, rather the display state for rows, columns, and/or cells.

TCustomGrid maintains an internal TGridState member used to track the state for the grid control. Methods in TCustomGrid cause the value in the member to be read or updated to reflect the request and/or completion of an action in the grid control.
Use the TCustomGrid.Options and TCustomGrid.Options2 properties to determine if specific features or behaviors are enabled for a grid control.

element.name: TGridState.gsNormal
element.short: Normal state for the grid when navigation or editing can be performed

element.name: TGridState.gsSelecting
element.short: Grid is selecting a row, column, or cell after keyboard or mouse activity

element.name: TGridState.gsRowSizing
element.short: Grid is resizing a row

element.name: TGridState.gsColSizing
element.short: Grid is resizing a column

element.name: TGridState.gsRowMoving
element.short: Grid is moving or dragging a row

element.name: TGridState.gsColMoving
element.short: Grid is moving or dragging a column

element.name: TGridState.gsHeaderClicking
element.short: A fixed header cell has been clicked in the Grid

element.name: TGridState.gsButtonColumnClicking
element.short: A button in a column has been clicked

element.name: TGridZone
element.short: Enumerated type for grid zone values

descr.p: TGridZone is an enumeration type with values representing zones in a grid control which are monitored to determine activity and subsequent changes in the grid control state.

element.name: TGridZoneSet
element.short: Set type used to store TGridZone enumeration values

element.name: TAutoAdvance
element.short: Enumerated type with values controlling grid auto advance behavior

descr.p: TAutoAdvance is an enumerated type with values that represent the auto advance behaviors available in a grid control. TAutoAdvance is the type used to represent the AutoAdvance and TabAdvance properties in TCustomGrid.

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaNone
element.short: Auto advance is not enabled

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaDown
element.short: Advances down to the next row in the grid

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaRight
element.short: Advances to the right (next cell) in the grid

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaLeft
element.short: Advances to the left (previous cell) in the grid

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaRightDown
element.short: Advances to the right and then to the next row

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaLeftDown
element.short: Advances to the left and then to the next row

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaRightUp
element.short: Advances to the right and then to the previous row

element.name: TAutoAdvance.aaLeftUp
element.short: Advances to the left and then to the previous row

element.name: TRangeSelectMode
element.short: Range selection modes available in a grid control

element.name: TRangeSelectMode.rsmSingle
element.short: Allows range selection for a single range in a grid

element.name: TRangeSelectMode.rsmMulti
element.short: Allows range selection for multiple ranges in a grid

notes.note: Not used in the current implementation.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle
element.short: Enumerated type with cell editor types available in a grid control

descr.p: TColumnButtonStyle is an enumerated type with values that represent the different cell editor types available in a grid control. TColumnButtonStyle is the type used for the TGridColumn.ButtonStyle property, and passed as an argument when an editor is requested for a column definition. It is also used when the TCustomGrid.GetDefaultEditor method is called to get the default cell editor for a given column.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsAuto
element.short: Button style is automatically determined by the grid control. Results in a TStringCellEditor being used for the cell.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsEllipsis
element.short: Button style with an Ellipsis (...) is displayed as the cell editor. Results in a TCompositeCellEditor being used for the cell.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsNone
element.short: Indicates no editor is required for a cell.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsPickList
element.short: Indicates a Pick List is used as the cell editor. Results in a TPickListCellEditor being used for the cell.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsCheckboxColumn
element.short: Indicates a CheckBox is displayed as the editor for the grid column.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsButton
element.short: Indicates a cell editor with a Button is used as the cell editor. Results in a TButtonCellEditor being used.

element.name: TColumnButtonStyle.cbsButtonColumn
element.short: Indicates a button centered in the cell is used as the cell editor.

element.name: TTitleStyle
element.short: Enumeration with values that control the display style for fixed title cells

descr.p: TTitleStyle is an enumerated type with values that determine the drawing style used for fixed title cells in a grid. TTitleStyle is the type used to implement the TCustomGrid.TitleStyle property, and used in the implementation of the TCustomGrid.DrawCellGrid method.

element.name: TTitleStyle.tsLazarus
element.short: Titles are displayed using the Lazarus drawing style

element.name: TTitleStyle.tsStandard
element.short: Titles are displayed using the standard drawing style (higher contrast)

element.name: TTitleStyle.tsNative
element.short: Titles are displayed using the drawing style Native to the OS or platform

descr.p: TGridFlagsOption is an enumerated type with values which reflect temporal state changes in a grid control. Values from TGridFlagsOption are stored at run-time in the TGridFlags set type used for the TCustomGrid.GridFlags property.

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfEditorUpdateLock
element.short: Indicates a cell is locked during a cell editor update

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfNeedsSelectActive
element.short: Indicates a selection needs to be active prior to mouse down or move actions

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfEditorTab
element.short: Indicates a Tab key can be applied to focus the next cell in the grid

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfRevEditorTab
element.short: Indicates a Shift+Tab key combination can be applied to select the previous cell in the grid

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfVisualChange
element.short: Indicates visible changes to row or column sizes can be applied to the grid

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfColumnsLocked
element.short: Indicates columns in the grid are locked and cannot be reordered

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfEditingDone
element.short: Indicates editing using a cell editor has been completed

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfSizingStarted
element.short: Indicates a row or column sizing action is in effect

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfPainting
element.short: Indicates the grid is being redrawn

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfUpdatingSize
element.short: Indicates the grid is updating its size

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfClientRectChange
element.short: Indicates the client rectangle for the grid has changed

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfAutoEditPending
element.short: Indicates a cell editor is being prepared for a newly selected cell in the grid

element.name: TGridFlagsOption.gfUpdatingScrollbar
element.short: Indicates the visibility of scrollbar(s) has been changed for a grid

element.name: TGridFlags
element.short: Set type used to store TGridFlagsOption enumeration values

descr.p: TGridFlags is a set type used to store TGridFlagsOption enumeration values. TGridFlags is the type used to implement the TCustomGrid.GridFlags property.

element.name: TSortOrder
element.short: Enumerated type with sort orders supported in a grid control

descr.p: TSortOrder is an enumerated type with values for sort orders supported in a grid control. TSortOrder is the type used to implement the TCustomGrid.SortOrder property.

element.name: TSortOrder.soAscending
element.short: Rows are sorted such that the column is in ascending order

element.name: TSortOrder.soDescending
element.short: Rows are sorted such that the column is in descending order

element.name: TPrefixOption
element.short: Indicates if Accelerator keys if column titles are handled for a grid

element.name: TPrefixOption.poNone
element.short: Accelerator keys are ignored in the grid

element.name: TPrefixOption.poHeaderClick
element.short: Accelerator keys emulate a mouse click on the column title

element.name: TMouseWheelOption
element.short: Enumerated type with values that control mouse wheel operation in a grid

element.name: TMouseWheelOption.mwCursor
element.short: Causes the mouse wheel to move the cursor on the screen

element.name: TMouseWheelOption.mwGrid
element.short: Causes the mouse wheel to scroll the content in the grid

element.name: TCellHintPriority
element.short: Represents cell hint display priorities

descr.p: A grid control can display three types of hint: the default hint (in the Hint property), individual cell hints (using the OnCellHint event), and hints for truncated cells. TCellHintPriority determines how the hint text is determined when multiple hint text values are displayed.

element.name: TCellHintPriority.chpAll
element.short: Uses all hints (both control and cell hints) including short and long display text values

element.name: TCellHintPriority.chpAllNoDefault
element.short: Uses all hints except the default hint for the grid control

element.name: TCellHintPriority.chpTruncOnly
element.short: Uses the truncated cell hint text

element.name: TCellProcessType
element.short: Identifies the action performed for cell content
element.descr: TCellProcessType is an enumerated type with values that identify the action performed for the content in a grid cell. Values in the enumeration indicate whether cell content is copied or pasted in event handlers. TCellProcessType arguments are passed to the TCustomStringGrid.OnCellProcess event handler.

element.name: TCellProcessType.cpCopy
element.short: Copies the content in a grid cell

element.name: TCellProcessType.cpPaste
element.short: Pastes content into the grid cell

element.name: soAll
element.short: All save options available in LCL grid controls

descr.p: soAll is a TSaveOptions set type representing all of the TGridSaveOptions values available in a LCL grid control.

element.name: DefaultGridOptions
element.short: Set with the default grid options enabled for LCL grid controls

element.name: constRubberSpace
element.short: Default spacing around rubberband rectangles

element.name: constCellPadding
element.short: Default padding for the content in grid cells

element.name: constColRowBorderTolerance
element.short: Minimum proximity to row or column borders for resizing operations

element.name: PCellProps
element.short: Pointer to a TCellProps type

element.name: TCellProps
element.short: Contains attributes, data, and text for grid cells

element.name: TCellProps.Attr
element.short: Attributes for a grid cell

element.name: TCellProps.Data
element.short: Data for a grid cell

element.name: TCellProps.Text
element.short: Display text for a grid cell

element.name: PColRowProps
element.short: Pointer to a TColRowProps type

element.name: TColRowProps
element.short: Contains the size and attributes for a column or a row in a grid

element.name: PGridMessage
element.short: Pointer to a TGridMessage type

element.name: TGridMessage
element.short: Contains a LCL message and its auxiliary values

element.name: TGridMessage.LclMsg
element.short: The LCL message value

element.name: TGridMessage.Grid
element.short: Grid for the LCL message

element.name: TGridMessage.Col
element.short: Grid column for the LCL message

element.name: TGridMessage.Row
element.short: Grid row for the LCL message

element.name: TGridMessage.Value
element.short: Cell value for the LCL message

element.name: TGridMessage.CellRect
element.short: Rectangle coordinates for the LCL message

element.name: TGridMessage.Options
element.short: Options for the LCL message

element.name: TStringCellEditor
element.short: Implements the default editor for cells in TCustomGrid

descr.p: TStringCellEditor is a TCustomMaskEdit descendant that implements the default editor for cells in TCustomGrid. TStringCellEditor contains internal members used to reference its Grid control, and to access the row and column numbers for the underlying grid cell. TStringCellEditor also implements methods needed for LCL message passing using TGridMessage. An event handler is also published to perform actions needed when editing has been completed in the cell editor.

element.name: TStringCellEditor.WndProc
element.short: Window handling procedure for the cell editor

element.name: TStringCellEditor.WndProc.TheMessage
element.short: LCL message for the window handling procedure

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetMask
element.short: msg_SetMask - issues message for specifying mask

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetMask.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetValue
element.short: msg_SetValue - issue message for specifying value

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetValue.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_GetValue
element.short: msg_GetValue - issues message for obtaining value

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_GetValue.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetGrid
element.short: msg_SetGrid - issues message for specifying grid

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetGrid.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SelectAll
element.short: msg_SelectAll - issues message for Selecting All

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SelectAll.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetPos
element.short: msg_SetPos - issues message for specifying position

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_SetPos.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_GetGrid
element.short: Message used to get the grid control for the cell editor

element.name: TStringCellEditor.msg_GetGrid.Msg
element.short: Message for the control

element.name: TStringCellEditor.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance. Create calls the inherited constructor using the value in AOwner as an argument. Create sets the value in the AutoSize to False.

element.name: TStringCellEditor.Create.AOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance

element.name: TStringCellEditor.EditingDone
element.short: Performs actions needed when the cell editor has finished editing the value in a cell

descr.p: EditingDone is an overridden procedure used to perform actions required when the cell editor has finished editing the value in a cell. EditingDone calls the inherited method, and calls the EditingDone method in the attached Grid control (when assigned) for the cell editor.

element.name: TStringCellEditor.EditText
element.descr: EditText is a published in TStringCellEditor.

element.name: TStringCellEditor.OnEditingDone
element.descr: OnEditingDone is a published in TStringCellEditor.

element.name: TButtonCellEditor
element.short: TButtonCellEditor - the editor for button cells in a grid

descr.p: TButtonCellEditor is a TButton descendant which implements a grid cell editor which uses a button to activate the editor control. TButtonCellEditor maintains interval member variables for the TCustomGrid hosting the editor control. The row and column numbers for the underlying cell for the editor control are available in the Row and Col properties. TButtonCellEditor includes methods used to perform LCL message passing using a TGridMessage message type.

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_SetGrid
element.short: msg_SetGrid - issues message for specifying grid

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_SetBounds
element.short: msg_SetBounds - issues message for specifying bounds

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_SetPos
element.short: msg_SetPos - issues message for specifying position

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_SetPos.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_Ready
element.short: msg_Ready - issues message when ready

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.msg_Ready.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.Col
element.short: Column number for the grid cell editor

descr.p: Col is a public read-only Integer which contains the column number for the cell hosting the editor control.
Use Row to access the row number for the cell hosting the editor control.

element.name: TButtonCellEditor.Row
element.short: Row number for the grid cell editor

descr.p: Row is a public read-only Integer which contains the row number for the cell hosting the editor control.
Use Col to access the column number for the cell hosting the editor control.

element.name: TPickListCellEditor
element.short: Implements a cell editor control which displays a Pick List

descr.p: TPickListCellEditor is a TCustomComboBox descendant which implements a cell editor control that displays a Pick List. TPickListCellEditor provides overridden methods to alter the behavior of the TCustomComboBox ancestor.

TPickListCellEditor has an internal member used to store the TCustomGrid for the cell editor. In addition, the Row and Column numbers for the underlying cell are stored in internal members. TPickListCellEditor provides methods needed to implement LCL message passing using the TGridMessage message type.

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_GetValue
element.short: msg_GetValue - issues a message to find the value

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_GetValue.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetGrid
element.short: msg_SetGrid - issues a message to specify the grid

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetGrid.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetValue
element.short: msg_SetValue - issues a message to specify the value

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetValue.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetPos
element.short: msg_SetPos - issues a message to specify the position

element.name: TPickListCellEditor.msg_SetPos.Msg
element.short: LCL message for the grid control

element.name: TEditorItem
element.short: TEditorItem - a single item on which a Composite Cell Editor operates

element.name: TEditorItem.Editor
element.short: The Editor to be used for this item

element.name: TEditorItem.Align
element.short: Align - how this item is to be aligned

element.name: TEditorItem.ActiveControl
element.short: ActiveControl - returns True if this item is part of an active control

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor
element.short: TCompositeCellEditor - a general purpose editor for cells in a grid

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_GetValue
element.short: msg_GetValue - issues a message to find the value

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SetGrid
element.short: msg_SetGrid - issues message for specifying grid

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SetValue
element.short: msg_SetValue - issues a message to specify the value

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SetBounds
element.short: msg_SetBounds - issues message for specifying bounds

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SetMask
element.short: msg_SetMask - issues message for specifying mask

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SelectAll
element.short: msg_SelectAll - issues message for Selecting All

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.CMControlChange
element.short: CMControlChange - issues Control Message for a change in a control

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.msg_SetPos
element.short: msg_SetPos - issues a message to specify the position

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.SendChar
element.short: SendChar - transmits the specified character and returns an integer status result
element.descr: 0 - failure, 1 - success

element.name: TCompositeCellEditor.AddEditor
element.short: AddEditor - adds the specified Editor with the given alignment and specified ActiveControl property

element.name: TOnDrawCell
element.short: Defines the event handler signalled to draw a cell a grid control

element.name: TOnDrawCell.Sender

element.name: TOnSelectCellEvent
element.short: Specifies the event handler signalled when a cell is selected in a grid control
element.descr: TOnSelectCellEvent specifies the event handler signalled when a cell is selected in a custom-drawn grid control. TOnSelectCellEvent is the type used to implement the OnSelectCell in TCustomDrawGrid.

element.name: TOnSelectCellEvent.Sender
element.short: Control for the event notification

element.name: TOnSelectCellEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the selection notification

element.name: TOnSelectCellEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the selection notification

element.name: TOnSelectCellEvent.CanSelect
element.short: Set to True if the specified cell can be selected

element.name: TOnSelectEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled for a selection in a grid control

descr.p: TOnSelectEvent specifies an event handler signalled when a selection is made in a grid control. TOnSelectEvent is the type used to implement event handler properties in TCustomGrid, including:
Applications must implement an object procedure using the signature for the event handler to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TOnSelectEvent.Sender
element.short: Control generating the event notification

element.name: TOnSelectEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the selection

element.name: TOnSelectEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the selection

element.name: TGridOperationEvent
element.short: Event handler signalled when rows or columns are added, deleted or moved in a grid

descr.p: TGridOperationEvent specifies an event handler signalled when rows or columns are added, deleted or moved in a custom-drawn grid control. TGridOperationEvent is the type used to implement event handler properties in TCustomDrawGrid, including:
Applications must implement an object procedure using the signature for the event handler to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TGridOperationEvent.Sender
element.short: Control for the event notification

element.name: TGridOperationEvent.IsColumn
element.short: True when the notification is for a column and not a row

element.name: TGridOperationEvent.sIndex
element.short: Starting index position for the row or column

element.name: TGridOperationEvent.tIndex
element.short: Final index position for the row or column

element.name: THdrEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled when an event occurs in a fixed header cell

descr.p: THdrEvent specifies an event handler signalled when an event occurs in a column header. Arguments passed to the event handler indicate whether the action occurred for a column or a row header, and the index position for the row or column.

THdrEvent is the type used to implement the OnHeaderClick and OnHeaderSized properties in TCustomDrawGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the event signature to respond to the event notification.

element.name: THdrEvent.Sender
element.short: Control generating the event notification

element.name: THdrEvent.IsColumn
element.short: True if the event applies to a column header; False when a row header is affected

element.name: THdrEvent.Index
element.short: Index position for the row or column in the event notification

element.name: TOnCompareCells
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled to compare cell values

descr.p: TOnCompareCells specifies an event handler signalled to compare the cells at the coordinates in ACol, ARow, BCol, and BRow. ACol and ARow are the column and row numbers for the first value in the comparison. BCol and BRow are the column and row number for the second value in the comparison.

Result is a variable Integer argument used to return the relative sort order for the compared values. The event handler must perform the actions needed to compare the cell values, and set the value in Result accordingly. Result should contain the following values:

dl.dd: The cell value at ACol, ARow occurs before the value at BCol, BRow
The compared cells contain the same values
The cell value at ACol, ARow occurs after the cell value at BCol, BRow

descr.p: TOnCompareCells is the type used to implement the OnCompareCells in TCustomGrid.

element.name: TOnCompareCells.Result
element.short: Relative sort order for the compared values

element.name: TOnCompareCells.Sender
element.short: Control generating the event notification

element.name: TOnCompareCells.ACol
element.short: Column number for the first compared cell value

element.name: TOnCompareCells.ARow
element.short: Row number for the first compared cell value

element.name: TOnCompareCells.Bcol
element.short: Column number for the second compared cell value

element.name: TOnCompareCells.BRow
element.short: Row number for the second compared cell value

element.name: TSelectEditorEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled to get an editor control for the specified cell

descr.p: TSelectEditorEvent specifies an event handler signalled to get an editor control for the cell at the coordinates in ACol and ARow.
Editor is the TWinControl or descendent class instance to use as the cell editor for the given cell.
TSelectEditorEvent is the type used to implement the OnSelectEditor in TCustomGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the event signature to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TSelectEditorEvent.Sender
element.short: Control generating the event notification

element.name: TSelectEditorEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the cell editor

element.name: TSelectEditorEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the cell editor

element.name: TSelectEditorEvent.Editor
element.short: Editor control to use for the specified cell

element.name: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled when preparing the canvas for a grid control

descr.p: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent specifies an event handler signalled when the canvas for a grid control is prepared for rendering. TOnPrepareCanvasEvent allows the canvas for the grid control to be altered prior to rendering cell data.
Sender is the grid control triggering the event notification.
ACol and ARow are the column and row numbers (respectively) for the grid cell in the event notification.
AState contains the grid drawing state for the cell data.
TOnPrepareCanvasEvent is the type used to implement the OnPrepareCanvas in TCustomGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the event signature to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent.Sender
element.short: Grid control for the event notification

element.name: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the cell in the event notification

element.name: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the cell in the event notification

element.name: TOnPrepareCanvasEvent.aState
element.short: Grid drawing state for the cell in the event notification

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent
element.short: Specifies the event handler used to get the image drawn for a Checkbox column in a grid

descr.p: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent specifies an event handler signalled to get the image drawn for a grid cell which displays a Checkbox.
Sender is the grid control generating the event notification.
ACol and ARow are the column and row numbers (respectively) for the cell where the Checkbox is drawn.
CheckedState indicates whether the Checkbox is drawn using the Checked state.
ImageList contains the images used for the Unchecked and Checked states.
ImageIndex indicates the image in ImageList used for the drawing operation.

TUserCheckBoxImageEvent is the type used to implement the OnUserCheckboxImage in TCustomGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the event signature to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.Sender
element.short: Grid generating the event notification

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the cell

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the cell

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.CheckedState
element.short: State for the Checkbox

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.ImageList
element.short: Image list with unchecked and checked images

element.name: TUserCheckBoxImageEvent.ImageIndex
element.short: Position of the image to use in ImageList

element.name: TValidateEntryEvent
element.short: Specifies the event handler used to validate the content in a grid cell

descr.p: TValidateEntryEvent specifies an event handler used to validate the content in a grid cell. TValidateEntryEvent is the type used to implement the OnValidateEntry in TCustomGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the event signature to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TValidateEntryEvent.Sender
element.short: Grid generating the event notification

element.name: TValidateEntryEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the cell

element.name: TValidateEntryEvent.aRow

element.name: TValidateEntryEvent.NewValue
element.short: Value returned from the event handler

element.name: TToggledCheckboxEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled when the value in a CheckBox cell is changed

descr.p: TToggledCheckboxEvent specifies an event handler signalled when the value in CheckBox-style cell is changed in a grid. Arguments passed to the event handler identify the grid control for the event notification, the row and column numbers for the altered cell, and the state for a CheckBox cell editor.

TToggledCheckboxEvent is the type used to implement the OnCheckboxToggled in TCustomGrid and descendent classes. Applications must implement an object procedure using the signature for the event handler to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TToggledCheckboxEvent.Sender
element.short: Grid control for the event notification

element.name: TToggledCheckboxEvent.aCol
element.short: Column number for the altered cell

element.name: TToggledCheckboxEvent.aRow
element.short: Row number for the altered cell

element.name: TToggledCheckboxEvent.aState
element.short: State for the CheckBox in the associated cell editor

element.name: THeaderSizingEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled when a fixed cell header in a grid is resized

descr.p: THeaderSizingEvent specifies an event handler signalled when a fixed cell header in a grid is resized. Arguments passed to the event handler identify the grid control for the event, and information the row or column affected by the operation.

THeaderSizingEvent is the type used to implement the OnHeaderSizing in TCustomDrawGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the signature for the event to allow responding to the event notification.

element.name: THeaderSizingEvent.Sender
element.short: Grid control for the event notification

element.name: THeaderSizingEvent.IsColumn

element.name: THeaderSizingEvent.aIndex

element.name: THeaderSizingEvent.aSize
element.short: Size (in pixels) for the resized cell

element.name: TCellProcessEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler used to process the value in a grid cell

descr.p: TCellProcessEvent specifies an event handler used to process the value in a grid cell in TCustomStringGrid. Arguments to the event handler identify the grid generating the event notification, the row and column numbers for the affected cell, and the value for the cell after processing. The processType argument specifies whether aValue is copied from or pasted to the cell.

TCellProcessEvent is the type used to implement the OnCellProcess in TCustomStringGrid. Applications must implement an object procedure using the signature for the event handler to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TCellProcessEvent.aValue
element.short: Value for the cell after processing has been applied

element.name: TVirtualGrid
element.short: Implements a grid for metadata where rows and columns are stored as arrays of Pointers

descr.p: TVirtualGrid is a class used to represent a grid where the rows and columns containing grid metadata are stored as arrays of Pointers. Data stored in the grid includes the Size for data in a cell, and pointers to attributes for fixed and normal cell display.
TVirtualGrid is the type used for an internal member in TCustomDrawGrid.

element.name: TGridColumnTitle

descr.p: TGridColumnTitle is TPersistent descendant used to represent properties and methods relevant to the title for a column in a grid. Use the published properties in the class to access the layout and display attributes for the column title, including:
Use the Caption to read or write the text displayed as the title for a grid column.
Use the Column to read the column reference (assigned in the constructor for the class instance) to which the column title is attached.
TGridColumnTitle is the type used to implement the TGridColumn.Title property.

element.name: TGridColumnTitle.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance

descr.p: Create is the virtual constructor for the class instance. Create calls the inherited constructor, allocates resources, and sets the default values for members in the class instance.

Create calls the FillTitleDefaultFont method to get the default value used in the Font property. It can contain either the font for titles in the Grid instance or the font for the Column definition; preference is given to the value in the Grid.
Create assigns the FontChanged method as the OnChange event handler for the Font property.
TheColumn contains contains the TGridColumn instance where the column title is used.

descr.p: MultiLine is a Boolean that indicates if the column title can be displayed as multiple lines. The default value for the is False. Changing the value in MultiLine cause the ColumnChanged method for the TGridColumn class instance to be called.

element.name: TGridColumnTitle.PrefixOption
element.short: Indicates if accelerator keys are used in the column title

descr.p: PrefixOption is a TPrefixOption that indicates if accelerator keys are recognized and displayed in the column title. The default value for the is poNone, and indicates Accelerator keys are ignored for the column title. Changing the value in PrefixOption causes the ColumnChanged method for the TGridColumn class instance to be called.

element.name: TGridColumn
element.short: Implements a column definition used for tabular data in TCustomGrid

descr.p: TGridColumn is a TCollectionItem descendant which implements a column definition for grid controls. TGridColumn contains properties which control the appearance, layout, and editing behavior used for a column in TCustomGrid and descendent classes. For instance:

The column has an associated TGridColumnTitle class instance in Title that defines the fixed cell header displayed for the column. As a convenience, the column includes a reference to the TCustomGrid which uses the column definition.
Instances of TGridColumn are created by and stored in the TGridColumns collection class. Use the methods in TGridColumns to create, access, and maintain the items in the collection.

element.name: TGridColumn.FontChanged
element.short: Performs actions needed when the Font has been changed for the grid column

descr.p: FontChanged is a procedure used to perform actions needed when the Font for the grid column has been changed. For TGridColumn, it sets the value in IsDefaultFont to False and calls the ColumnChanged method.

element.name: TGridColumns

descr.p: TGridColumns is a TCollection descendant that implements a container for column definitions used in TCustomGrid and descendent classes. TGridColumns is the type used to implement the Columns in TCustomGrid.

TGridColumns is used to create, access, and maintain TGridColumn class instances representing the columns in a grid. Use the indexed Items to access a TGridColumn instance in the collection using its ordinal position.

Additional properties and methods are included in the collection that are relevant to their use with grid column definitions. A reference to the TCustomGrid which owns the collection is maintained to provide access to the properties, methods, and events in the grid.

descr.p: Grid is a read-only TCustomGrid which provides access to the grid which owns the column collection. The value in Grid is set in the constructor to an argument passed to the method, and used as the value for the Owner property.
Grid can be used to access the properties, methods, and events in the grid class instance. It is used in the implementation of methods in the collection, such as Update and InsertColumn.

element.short: Provides indexed access to column definitions in the collection

descr.p: Items is an indexed TGridColumn used to access column definitions in the collection by the ordinal position specified in the Index argument. Items is the default for the collection.
Use Add to create and store a new instance of TGridColumn in the collection.
Use InsertColumn to create and store a new collection item at a specific position in the collection.
Use RemoveColumn, Delete or Clear to remove one or all item(s) in the collection.
Use IndexOf to get the ordinal position in the collection for an existing TGridColumn class instance.

element.name: TCustomGrid
element.short: TCustomGrid - the base class for all grid controls

descr.p: A grid is a collection of cells that are organized in columns and rows. Grids are suitable for showing data that using a tabular layout, for example tables in a database, or formulae and data in a spreadsheet.
The ColCount and RowCount properties contain the column and row count of the grid.
The FixedCols and FixedRows properties specify the count of fixed columns or rows that are used for headings.
The column widths and row heights of the grid are accessible with the ColWidths and RowHeights properties.
The DefaultColWidth and DefaultRowHeight properties are used to specify default column widths or row heights respectively.

The colors of the cells and the grid elements are specified with the AlternateColor, BorderColor, FixedColor, FixedHotColor, FocusColor, GridLineColor and SelectedColor properties. The GridWidth and GridHeight properties contain the dimension of the entire grid.
The ScrollBars controls the creation of scrollbars for the grid.
The LeftCol, TopRow, VisibleColCount and VisibleRowCount properties contain information about the visible area of the grid.
The Options controls options for the grid.
If the user highlights a cell of the grid, the SelectCell method is called that triggers the OnSelectCell event. The position of the highlighted cell is stored within the Col and Row property.
The MouseToCell method calculates a grid cell from a given screen position.
Huge changes to the grid should be encapsulated in calls to BeginUpdate and EndUpdate to speed up the application.
Component developers must override the DrawCell method in customized grids.

element.name: TCustomGrid.AdjustCount
element.short: Adjusts a row or column count

descr.p: AdjustCount is a procedure used to adjust the row or column count for the grid, and to update properties and cache information for the grid.
IsColumn indicates if the OldValue and NewValue arguments refer to the column or row count for the grid; when IsColumn is True, the values refer to the column count.
OldValue contains the previous row or column count in the grid.
NewValue contains the row or column count on exit from the method.

AdjustCount is called when the value in the RowCount or ColCount is changed. It calls the UpdateCachedSizes and SizeChanged methods. It may also call FixPos when NewValue causes the row or column to be out of range for the grid control.

element.name: TCustomGrid.doColSizing
element.short: Performs actions needed when a column in the grid is resized

descr.p: doColSizing is a Boolean function used to perform actions needed when a column in the grid is resized. X and Y contain the mouse coordinates where the action was initiated. The return value contains True when the resizing operation is successfully completed.

No actions are performed in doColSizing if the GridState member contains any value other than gsColSizing. The GridFlags member is updated to include the value gfSizingStarted, and the ResizeColumn and HeaderSizing methods are called to reflect the altered column size.

element.name: TCustomGrid.EditorGetValue
element.short: Gets the value for a cell editor

descr.p: EditorGetValue is a Boolean function used to get the value for a cell editor in the grid. EditorGetValue is used in the implementation of TCustomGrid methods like: EditorShowInCell, ResetEditor, MoveExtend, and DestroyHandle. It is used to get the cell value prior to editing, and to display the value from the cell editor when it is hidden.

Validate is a Boolean argument that indicates if the ValidateEntry method is called to validate the edited cell value. When it contains True, ValidateEntry is called prior to calling EditorDoSetValue and/or EditorHide.

The return value contains True when the edited cell value is valid. It also contains True if a cell editor has not been assigned or is not visible, or the method was called at design-time or during component destruction.

element.name: TCustomGrid.EditorGetValue.Result

element.name: TCustomGrid.InternalAutoFillColumns
element.short: Performs actions needed to resize one or more columns to fill the client area for the grid control

descr.p: InternalAutoFillColumns is a procedure used to resize one or more columns to fill the client area for the grid control. No actions are performed in the method if AutoFillColumns contains False, or when the method has already been called but has not yet completed.

InternalAutoFillColumns calls GetAutoFillColumnInfo to accumulate the fixed cell width, data width, and sizing priority for each of the Columns defined in the grid. At least one of the cells in the grid must have sizing priority; the last non-fixed column is expanded to fill the client area in the grid when no other column has sizing priority.
InternalAutoFillColumns is called from the UpdateCachedSizes method.

element.name: TCustomGrid.OnTitleFontChanged
element.short: Event handler signalled when the font used for fixed title cells has been changed

descr.p: OnTitleFontChanged is a procedure which implements the event handler signalled when the TitleFont for fixed cells has been changed. OnTitleFontChanged is assigned to the OnChange event handler in TitleFont in the constructor for the class instance.

OnTitleFontChanged sets the value in TitleFontIsDefault to False to reflect the change in the font setting. When Columns have been enabled (VisibleCount contains a non-zero value), the TitleFontChanged method in Columns is called. The ColumnsChanged method is called to force the grid to be updated. If Columns have not been enabled, the VisualChange method is called to update the grid control.

element.name: TCustomGrid.BeforeMoveSelection
element.short: BeforeMoveSelection - method to use before a selection is moved

descr.p: BeforeMoveSelection is called from the MoveExtend method whenever the current grid cursor location is about to change. The destination column and row are specified in the DCol and DRow parameters respectively.

The new location is known to be a valid selectable cell (see ), and is given in absolute cell coordinates. At this point the current grid location has not changed and can be retrieved with Col and Row properties.
The purpose of this method is to call the OnBeforeSelection event handler.

element.name: TCustomGrid.BeginAutoDrag
element.short: Starts an auto-drag operation in the grid control

descr.p: BeginAutoDrag is an overridden procedure used to start an auto-dragging operation. Auto-dragging is in effect when DragMode contains the value dmAutomatic.

BeginAutoDrag examines the Options property to determine if column sizing (goColSizing) or row sizing (goRowSizing) have been enabled for the grid control. In addition, the CursorState property must contain a value that represents the action (gcsColWidthChanging or gcsRowHeightChanging). If either condition is not met, BeginDrag is called using False as an argument.

notes.note: Not currently used in the grid implementation.

element.name: TCustomGrid.CalcScrollbarsRange
element.short: Updates the range, page, and thumb position for visible scrollbars

descr.p: CalcScrollbarsRange is a procedure used to update the range, page, and thumb position for visible scrollbars in the grid control. CalcScrollbarsRange accesses the cached grid data in GCache to calculate values needed in the method. The visibility for both horizontal and vertical scrollbars is determined, and the range, page and thumb position is applied in the UpdateHorzScrollBar and UpdateVertScrollbar methods.
CalcScrollbarsRange is used in the implementation of the ScrollBy and UpdateSizes methods in TCustomGrid.

element.name: TCustomGrid.ColumnIndexFromGridColumn
element.short: Gets the position of the specified column relative to the first column in the grid

descr.p: ColumnIndexFromGridColumn is an Integer function used to get the position of the specified column relative to the first column in the grid. The return value contains the difference between Column and FirstGridColumn when Columns have been enabled in the grid control. RealIndex is called to translate the position used in the return value. If Columns have not been enabled, the return value is -1.
ColumnIndexFromGridColumn is used in the implementation of TCustomGrid methods like:

element.name: TCustomGrid.DialogChar
element.short: Applies an accelerator key to a column in the grid

descr.p: DialogChar is an overridden Boolean function used to apply Lazarus messages with accelerator keys for columns in the grid. Message contains the TLMKey instance with the message examined in the method. DialogChar examines each of the Columns defined for the grid to determine if the CharCode for the Message is an accelerator key appearing in the title for the column. When a match is found, the HeaderClick method is called to activate the column.
The return value contains the result from the inherited DialogChar method.

element.name: TCustomGrid.DrawThemedCell

descr.p: DrawThemedCell is a procedure used to draw the cell at the specified coordinates using the theme services for the platform or widget set. DrawThemedCell is used to render fixed header cells in the DefaultDrawCell method.
aCol contains the column number for the affected cell.
aRow contains the row number for the affected cell.
aRect contains the screen coordinates for the cell rendered in the method.

aState contains the grid drawing state applied to the cell. aState contains a value from the TGridDrawState enumeration that determines the theme service element details used for the drawing operation.

Draws the cell using the Hotlighted state
Draws the cell using the normal drawing state

element.name: TCustomGrid.ScrollBarShow
element.short: ScrollBarShow method

descr.p: ScrollBarShow is a procedure used to control the visibility of scrollbars in the grid.
Which is an Integer argument that specifies the scrollbar(s) affected in the method, and can include the following constant values:

dl.dd: Horizontal scrollbar
Vertical scrollbar
Both horizontal and vertical scrollbars

descr.p: aValue is a Boolean argument that indicates if the specified scrollbar(s) are visible or hidden. When aValue contains True, the corresponding scrollbar(s) are displayed. Otherwise, they are hidden.

No actions are performed in the method if a handle has not been allocated for the grid instance (HandleAllocated returns False). ScrollBarShow ensures that gfUpdatingScrollbar is included in the grid flags prior to calling the ShowScrollBar method. The flag value is removed immediately after updating the scrollbar display. Internal members used to track scrollbar visibility are set to the state requested in AValue.

element.name: TCustomGrid.ScrollBarShow.Which
element.short: Scrollbar(s) affected in the method

element.name: TCustomGrid.ScrollBarShow.aValue
element.short: True indicates the scrollbar(s) are visible

element.name: TCustomGrid.ScrollBarAutomatic
element.descr: Check if scrollbars are shown automatically by the grid or not. 'Which' can be any of : SB_BOTH, SB_VERT, SB_HORZ

The aCol and aRow parameters contain the column and the row of the highlighted cell.
Component developers may use the SelectCell method to react to focus changes. The Result is true if the cell can be selected. Application developers should use the OnSelectCell event instead.

element.name: TCustomGrid.ShowCellHintWindow
element.short: Gets and displays the cell hint(s) for the current cell in the grid

descr.p: ShowCellHintWindow is a procedure used to gets the value(s) and display cell hint(s) for the cell located at the screen position in APoint. Values in the Options and CellHintPriority properties determine the text available for use as cell hints.

GetCellHintText and GetTruncCellHintText are called to get the corresponding hint text for the options and hint priority. AddToHint is called to apply the derived text to the values displayed in the control using its Hint property. Application.ActivateHint is called to display the hint window.
No actions are performed in the method when ShowHints contains False, when the mouse pointer is not positioned over a grid cell, when EditorMode is True, or at design-time.

element.name: TCustomGrid.ShowCellHintWindow.APoint
element.short: Screen coordinates for the mouse pointer

element.name: TCustomGrid.SizeChanged
element.short: SizeChanged - specifies the old number of columns and rows

element.short: Sorts rows or columns in the grid

descr.p: Sort is a method used to sort all items in the grid. When ColSorting is True, it sorts the items in a column. Otherwise, it sorts a row. The three given indexes specify the items to be sorted.

element.name: TCustomGrid.Sort.ColSorting
element.short: Indicates if the sort is performed for a column instead of a row

descr.p: ValidateEntry is a Boolean function used to a validate the value for the cell at the specified Col and Row position.

ValidateEntry signals the OnValidateEntry event handler (when assigned) to perform validation for the cell. The return value is True when OnValidateEntry completes successfully, or when the event handler has not been assigned.

element.name: TCustomGrid.ValidateEntry.Result
element.short: True when validation completes successfully
